entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A mix of sun and cloud. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
